authors.name: Save Breach Team
authors.bio: People you can rely on for your website security. We are a bunch of people with a deep interest in security vulnerabilities. Passion is the core part of the work we do.

node.plaintext:
We specialize in four-letter .com, here are some of them. Short four letter
domains are better for organic SEO, short linking and being shorter and
memorable, great for word-of-mouth marketing.

All four letter .com domains were registered almost a decade back and the demand
keeps surging with more companies moving to shorter domains. Also, they
naturally enjoy a very strong resale value, and become an asset for a company at
the time of liquidation.

Here are a few CVVC, and pronounceable 4 letter .COMs we have.

 * LoiQ.com [http://loiq.com], a unique blend of Logic & IQ, a shorter form of
   spelling logic also, named after the famous poet, Loiq Sher Ali of
   Tajikisatan 
 * FeyF.com [http://feyf.com], Fresh Leaf, Fee Financials and so on 
 * fVUX.com [http://fVUX.com]
node.html:
We specialize in four-letter .com, here are some of them. Short four letter domains are better for organic SEO, short linking and being shorter and memorable, great for word-of-mouth marketing.

All four letter .com domains were registered almost a decade back and the demand keeps surging with more companies moving to shorter domains. Also, they naturally enjoy a very strong resale value, and become an asset for a company at the time of liquidation.

Here are a few CVVC, and pronounceable 4 letter .COMs we have.

  • LoiQ.com, a unique blend of Logic & IQ, a shorter form of spelling logic also, named after the famous poet, Loiq Sher Ali of Tajikisatan
  • FeyF.com, Fresh Leaf, Fee Financials and so on
  • fVUX.com
